## FileVersion class

metadata to describe a version of a file as it relates to a filesystem

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class FileVersion 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ handle, size, created, modified })](./opaque.fileversion._constructor_.md) |  | create metadata for a file version |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [created](./opaque.fileversion.created.md) |  | <code>number</code> | the date in <code>ms</code> that this version was uploaded |
|  [handle](./opaque.fileversion.handle.md) |  | <code>string</code> | the shareable handle of the file |
|  [modified](./opaque.fileversion.modified.md) |  | <code>number</code> | the date in <code>ms</code> that the filesystem marked as last modified |
|  [size](./opaque.fileversion.size.md) |  | <code>number</code> | the size of the file in bytes |
